CustomField.description: BODEV-2117: Formula to indicate the gap b/w Opp ARR and Sum of all the Sales KPI movement fields.
CustomField.formula:
IF( IsClosed = FALSE || ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Renewal")) ), 0,
ROUND( ARR_manual__c - ( New_ARR__c + Expansion_ARR__c - Contraction_ARR__c + Churn_ARR__c + Renewal_ARR__c + IF( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost"), -1, 1) * Internal_Transfer_ARR__c + New_ARR_Platform_transfer__c + Churn_ARR_Platform_Transfer__c + Indexation_ARR_when_renewal_is_closed__c + Renewal_Uplift_ARR__c ), 0 ) )
CustomField.label: Sales KPI Movement Gap
